AD.name: OpenSearch service URL
AD.description: The OpenSearch endpoint URL or DDF's OpenSearch endpoint (http://0.0.0.0:8181/services/catalog/query)

AD.name: Username
AD.description: Username to use with HTTP Basic Authentication. This auth info will overwrite any federated auth info. Only set this if the OpenSearch endpoint requires basic authentication.

AD.name: Password
AD.description: Password to use with HTTP Basic Authentication. This auth info will overwrite any federated auth info. Only set this if the OpenSearch endpoint requires basic authentication.

AD.name: OpenSearch query parameters
AD.description: Query parameters to use with the OpenSearch connection.

AD.name: Always perform local query
AD.description: When federating with other DDFs, keep this checked. If checked, this source performs a local query on the remote site (by setting src=local in endpoint URL), as opposed to an enterprise search.

AD.name: Convert to BBox
AD.description: Converts Polygon and Point-Radius searches to a Bounding Box for compatability with older interfaces. Generated bounding box is a very rough representation of the input geometry.
